## Request Type

<!-- Please check one: -->
- [ ] **Opt-In**: I want my repository included in the registry
- [ ] **Opt-Out**: I want my repository removed from the registry
- [ ] **Update**: I want to update information about my repository

## Repository Information

**Repository URL:** https://github.com/owner/repo

**Repository Owner/Maintainer:** @github-username

## Additional Context

<!--
For Opt-In:
- Why do you think your repository fits the discovery pattern criteria?
- What discovery patterns do you use in your documentation?
- Any specific contact information you'd like displayed?

For Opt-Out:
- We respect your privacy. No explanation needed.

For Update:
- What information needs to be updated?
-->

## Privacy Agreement (for Opt-In only)

By opting in, I confirm that:
- [ ] The repository information is publicly available
- [ ] I consent to having contact information (as publicly stated in my repository) displayed in the registry
- [ ] I understand this registry is for connecting peer architects interested in AI-native development

---

**Note:** All information displayed in the registry is sourced from publicly available repository data. We respect privacy and will promptly process opt-out requests.
